code:
n = int(input())
a = []
b = []
i = 2
while n > 1:
	p = 0
	while n % i == 0:
		n //= i
		p += 1
	if p > 0:
		a += [i]
		b += [p]
	i += 1
if len(a) == 0 and n == 1:
	print(0)
else:
	p = 1
	for i in range(len(a)):
		s = 0
		k = 1
		for j in range(0, b[i]+1):
			s += k * k
			k *= a[i]
		p *= s
	print(p%1000000007)
